title: Ladies Are you bored , seeking some fun and excitement ?
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Same here! Single, bored and seeking to meet a like minded female to chill with and have some laughter, banter fun and excitement.

I'm in my 30s, slim toned body, tall, professional, educated, charismatic, sane, easy-going, caring, friendly, cheeky witty sense of humour and mostly a down to earth guy.
KIK: Ashworth143
If you like sound of my ad, get intouch with your info and brief description of you.

Thanks.
